import React from "react"; import style from '../css/filmDetail.module.css' const FilmDescription = ({ title, release_date, popularity, overview, genres = [], poster_path, }) => ( <>

{title} ({release_date}){" "}

Popularity {popularity}

Overview

{overview}

Genres

    {genres.map((genre) => (
  • {genre.name}
    • ))}
); export default FilmDescription;
